description:
The 3rd Universe activates its secret final weapon! The 7th Universe will need to combine all their strength if they hope to defeat this quadruple-fused foe!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: All-Out War! The Ultimate Quadruple Merge vs Universe 7`s Full-Scale Attack!!
Souryokusen! Kyuukyoku no 4 Tai Gattai vs Dai 7 Uchuu Soukougeki!!
総力戦! 究極の4体合体VS第7宇宙総攻撃!!
